data.message: I see a lot of people showing their  on this day but I can not find it for me. Someone said that we had been friends for 8 years on Facebook but it never showed up on my page. How do I activate this feature?

replies.message: Hi Marley. You can access your On This Day posts by going to http://bit.ly/2u7CMQy.  Information for On This Day can be found here: http://bit.ly/2hrDUIA. Please keep in mind that this feature isn't available for everyone. -Ashley
Why isn't it available for everyone? Everyone I know has this feature.
